h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area
content: Just like in Chapter 1, Chapter 2 of Black Myth: Wukong has a secret area for you to discover. Accessing this one involves an NPC questline, so here's everything you need to know from how to find the drunken boar that will get you into the Kingdom of Sahali.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_2_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area'.
The content is as follows:
Just like in Chapter 1, Chapter 2 of Black Myth: Wukong has a secret area for you to discover. Accessing this one involves an NPC questline, so here's everything you need to know from how to find the drunken boar that will get you into the Kingdom of Sahali.
